sentences.en: A new - type ocean - going freighter is being laid down at that shipyard.
sentences.cn: 一艘新型的远洋货轮正在那家船厂建造.

sentences.en: A new battleship was launched from a shipyard.
sentences.cn: 一艘新战舰从船坞下水.

sentences.en: Bicycles are the most common mode of transportation for shipyard workers.
sentences.cn: 自行车是船厂工人最主要的交通工具.

sentences.en: China would probably build a carrier at the Shanghai Jiangnan Shipyard.
sentences.cn: 中国大概建在上海江南造船厂载体.

sentences.en: George was a fitter at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: 乔治是造船厂的一名钳工。
这个厂定名为东风造船厂.

sentences.en: The Queen Mary 2 is currently docked at the shipyard.
sentences.cn: “玛丽女王２号”现在停泊在修船厂。

sentences.en: The shipyard is working on three different jobs, ie building three ships.
sentences.cn: 该造船厂正在造叁艘船.

sentences.en: The shipyard workers laid down a new ship.
sentences.cn: 造船厂的工人开始造新船了.

sentences.en: They launched a ship from a shipyard.
They'd been a dejected lot when he'd arrived at the shipyard, but now they sparkled with enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他刚到船厂时，他们曾是一群垂头丧气的人，现在的他们却热情洋溢。

sentences.en: This brought me into touch with many workers in the shipyard.
sentences.cn: 这使我有机会接触到造船厂的许多工人.

sentences.en: This management mode was firstly carried on in Zhenjiang Shipyard.
sentences.cn: 这种管理模式首先(于哪年哪月)在浙船实施.

sentences.en: This shipyard is at the cutting edge of world shipbuilding technology.
sentences.cn: 该造船厂的造船技术处于世界最前沿。

sentences.en: We have awarded the contract to a British shipyard.
sentences.cn: 我们将合同给了一家英国造船厂。

sentences.en: Yantai Raffles Shipyard Limited is a leading offshore and marine fabrication specialist.
sentences.cn: 烟台莱佛士是国际领先的船舶及海洋工程设施建造专家.

trans.tran_en: a place where ships are built or repaired
